string_table.name: pxabnsnfns10111001101
string_table.string: Closed captions. Press the spacebar to toggle captions on and off.
Skip Navigation. Hit enter to return to the slide.

slidelink.displaytext: New Faculty Workshop Full Time Fall 2015- wedde
How To Register for Professional Development
How to Log In to HCC Email

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript: <Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="In your first week, you will be busy with several tasks, related to your teaching and administration of your courses. you’ll pick up your parking pass and ID from the Security office; submit your contract,complete online trainings, confirm the division office location, view your classroom, request orientation to any of the technologies in the classroom, request any additional technologies you need for your classroom and, finally, request access to any Canvas course sites you need for your course." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" ListLevel="1" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" ListTypeFormat="Plain" Start="0" Color="#000000,00" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="You’ll have a number of semester obligations. Some of them occur at the beginning of the semester, others at the end. Point to each of these on the list to learn more about them. On subsequent slides, you’ll get even more detail about each of these requirements." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="IDEA student evaluations is the assessment tool that HCC uses for student’s ratings of instruction. This is how your students will evaluate you. IDEA is administered the 11th-14th week of the semester.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The IDEA process is completely online for faculty and students. Students complete the survey online and faculty have access to response rates in real-time. At the end of the IDEA process faculty can access their course reports online.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="All IDEA correspondence will be sent to your HCC issued email. An IDEA survey announcement will be sent to you the 10th week of the semester with instructions on how to administer the survey and faculty resources pertaining to IDEA.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Check the faculty development calendar for upcoming workshops on IDEA.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style LeadingMargin="13" FirstLineMargin="0"> <ListStyle ListType="Bullet" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>
